content.gatha1: Ahāsiāhāsi me ambaphalāni pubbe, aṇūni thūlāni ca brahmacāri;
content.gathalast: Teheva mantehi na dāni tuyhaṃ, dumapphalā pātubhavanti brahme.
content.gatha1: Nakkhattayogaṃ paṭimānayāmi, khaṇaṃ muhuttañca mante na passaṃ ;
content.gathalast: Nakkhattayogañca khaṇañca laddhā, addhāharissambaphalaṃathāharissambaphalaṃathāharissambaphalaṃ pahūtaṃ.
content.gatha1: Nakkhattayogaṃ na pure abhāṇi, khaṇaṃ muhuttaṃ na pure asaṃsi;
content.gathalast: Sayaṃ harīathāharīathāharīathāharī ambaphalaṃ pahūtaṃ, vaṇṇena gandhena rasenupetaṃ.
content.gatha1: Mantābhijappena pure hi pura’ssa (sī. pī.), purepi (syā.) tuyhaṃ, dumapphalā pātubhavanti brahme;
content.gathalast: Svājja na pāresi jappampi mantaṃjapampi mantejapampi mante , ayaṃ so ko nāma tavajja dhammo.
content.gatha1: Caṇḍālaputto mama sampadāsi, dhammena mante pakatiñca saṃsi;
content.gathalast: Mā cassu me pucchito nāmagottaṃ, guyhittho atthaṃmā taṃmā taṃmā taṃ vijaheyya manto vijaheyyumantā (syā.).
content.gatha1: Sohaṃ janindena janamhi puṭṭho, makkhābhibhūto alikaṃ abhāṇiṃ;
content.gathalast: ‘‘Mantā ime brāhmaṇassā’’ti micchā, pahīnamanto kapaṇo rudāmi.
content.gatha1: Eraṇḍā pucimandā vā, atha vā pālibhaddakā;
content.gathalast: Madhuṃ madhutthiko vinde, so hi tassa dumuttamo.
content.gatha1: Khattiyā brāhmaṇā vessā, suddā caṇḍālapukkusā;
content.gathalast: Yamhā dhammaṃ vijāneyya, so hi tassa naruttamo.
content.gatha1: Imassa daṇḍañca vadhañca datvā, gale gahetvā khalayāthabalayāthagalayātha jammaṃ;
content.gathalast: Yo uttamatthaṃ kasirena laddhaṃ, mānātimānena vināsayittha.
content.gatha1: Yathā samaṃ maññamāno pateyya, sobbhaṃ guhaṃ narakaṃ pūtipādaṃ;
content.gatha2: Rajjūti vā akkame kaṇhasappaṃ, andho yathā jotimadhiṭṭhaheyya;
content.gathalast: Evampi maṃ tvaṃ khalitaṃ sapaññasapaññā , pahīnamantassa punappadāhipuna sampadāhipunappasīdapunappasīda .
content.gatha1: Dhammena mantaṃmantemantemante tava sampadāsiṃ, tuvampi dhammenatvampi dhammeneva pariggahesi;
content.gathalast: Pakatimpi te attamano asaṃsiṃ, dhamme ṭhitaṃ taṃ patiṭṭhaṃ (ka.) na jaheyya manto.
content.gatha1: Yo bāla mantaṃbalamantaṃ kasirena laddhaṃ, yaṃ dullabhaṃ ajja manussaloke;
content.gathalast: Kiñcāpi laddhā jīvituṃ appapaññokicchā laddhaṃ jīvikaṃ appapaññokicchā laddhaṃ jīvikaṃ appapaññokacchāpi laddhā jīvikaṃ appañña , vināsayī alikaṃ bhāsamāno.
content.gatha1: Bālassa mūḷhassa akataññuno ca, musā bhaṇantassa asaññatassa;
content.gathalast: Mante mayaṃ tādisake na dema, kuto mantā gaccha na mayha ruccasīti.
content.gatha1: Kuṭhārihatthokudhārihattho puriso, vanamogayha tiṭṭhasi;
content.gathalast: Puṭṭho me samma akkhāhi, kiṃ dāruṃ chetumicchasi.
content.gatha1: Issoisoīsoīso vanāni carasi, samāni visamāni ca;
content.gathalast: Puṭṭho me samma akkhāhi, kiṃ dāruṃ nemiyā daḷhaṃ.
content.gatha1: Neva sālo na khadiro, nāssakaṇṇo kuto dhavo;
content.gathalast: Rukkho ca rukkhova (sī. pī.) phandano nāma, taṃ dāruṃ nemiyā daḷhaṃ.
content.gatha1: Kīdisānissa pattāni, khandho vā pana kīdiso;
content.gathalast: Puṭṭho me samma akkhāhi, yathā jānemu phandanaṃ.
content.gatha1: Yassa sākhā palambanti, namanti na ca bhañjare;
content.gathalast: So rukkho phandano nāma, yassa mūle ahaṃ ṭhito.
content.gatha1: Arānaṃ cakkanābhīnaṃ, īsānemirathassa ca;
content.gathalast: Sabbassa te kammaniyo, ayaṃ hessati phandano.
content.gatha1: Iti phandanarukkhopi, tāvade ajjhabhāsatha;
content.gathalast: Mayhampi vacanaṃ atthi, bhāradvāja suṇohi me.
content.gatha1: Issassaimassaimassaimassa upakkhandhamhāupakhandhamhāupakhandhamhāupakhandhamhāupakhandhamhā , ukkacca caturaṅgulaṃ;
content.gathalast: Tena nemiṃ pasāresipariharesipariharesi , evaṃ daḷhataraṃ siyā.
content.gatha1: Iti phandanarukkhopi, veraṃ appesi tāvade;
content.gathalast: Jātānañca ajātānaṃ, issānaṃ dukkhamāvahi.
content.gatha1: Iccevaṃiccevaicceva phandano issaṃ, isso ca pana phandanaṃ;
content.gathalast: Aññamaññaṃ vivādena, aññamaññamaghātayuṃ.
content.gatha1: Evameva manussānaṃ, vivādo yattha jāyati;
content.gathalast: Mayūranaccaṃ naccanti, yathā te issaphandanā.
content.gatha1: Taṃ vo vadāmi bhaddaṃ vo bhaddante (ka.), yāvantettha samāgatā;
content.gathalast: Sammodatha mā vivadatha māvivadittha (sī. syā. pī.), mā hotha issaphandanā.
content.gatha1: Sāmaggimevasāmagyamevasāmagyameva sikkhetha, buddhehetaṃ pasaṃsitaṃ;
content.gathalast: Sāmaggirato dhammaṭṭho, yogakkhemā na dhaṃsatīti.
content.gatha1: Idheva haṃsa nipata, piyaṃ me tava dassanaṃ;
content.gathalast: Issarosi anuppatto, yamidhatthi pavedaya.
content.gatha1: Savanena ekassa piyā bhavanti, disvā panekassa viyetivinetivihetivigetivigeti chando;
content.gathalast: Disvā ca sutvā ca piyā bhavanti, kaccinnu me pīyasipiyyasipiyyasi dassanena.
content.gatha1: Savanena piyo mesi, bhiyyo cāgamma dassanaṃ;
content.gathalast: Evaṃ piyadassano meevaṃ piyadassano samānoevaṃ piyadassano samānoevaṃ piyadassano samāno , vasa haṃsa mamantikemama santikemama santikemama santike .
content.gatha1: Vaseyyāma tavāgāre, niccaṃ sakkatapūjitā;
content.gathalast: Matto ca ekadā vajjevajjāvajjā , ‘‘haṃsarājaṃ pacantu me’’.
content.gatha1: Dhiratthu taṃ majjapānaṃ, yaṃ me piyataraṃ tayā;
content.gathalast: Na cāpi majjaṃ pissāmipivissāmipāyāmipāyāmi , yāva me vacchasī ghare.
content.gatha1: Suvijānaṃ siṅgālānaṃ, sakuṇānañcasakuntānañcasakuntānañcasakuntānañca vassitaṃ;
content.gathalast: Manussavassitaṃ rāja, dubbijānataraṃ tato.
content.gatha1: Api ce maññatī poso, ñāti mitto sakhāti vā;
content.gathalast: Yo pubbe sumano hutvā, pacchā sampajjate diso.
content.gatha1: Yasmiṃ mano nivisati, avidūre sahāpi so;
content.gathalast: Santikepi hi so dūre, yasmiṃ nāvisateyasmā vivasateyasmā vivasateyasmā vivasate mano.
content.gatha1: Antopi so hoti pasannacitto, pāraṃ samuddassa pasannacitto;
content.gathalast: Antopi so hoti paduṭṭhacitto, pāraṃ samuddassa paduṭṭhacitto.
content.gatha1: Saṃvasantā vivasanti, ye disā te rathesabha;
content.gathalast: Ārā santo saṃvasanti, manasā raṭṭhavaḍḍhana.
content.gatha1: Aticiraṃ nivāsena, piyo bhavati appiyo;
content.gathalast: Āmanta kho taṃ gacchāmagacchāmi , purā te homa appiyāhomi appiyo .
content.gatha1: Evaṃ ce yācamānānaṃ, añjaliṃ nāvabujjhasi;
content.gatha2: Paricārakānaṃ sataṃsantānaṃsantānaṃsattānaṃ , vacanaṃ na karosi no;
content.gathalast: Evaṃ taṃ abhiyācāma, puna kayirāsi pariyāyaṃ.
content.gatha1: Evaṃ ce no viharataṃ, antarāyo na hessati;
content.gathalast: Appeva nāma passemupassemapassemapassema , ahoratānamaccayeti.
content.gatha1: Na te kaṭṭhāni bhinnāni, na te udakamābhataṃ;
content.gathalast: Aggīpi te na hāpitohāsitohāsito , kiṃ nu mandova jhāyasi.
content.gatha1: Na ussahe vane vatthuṃ, kassapāmantayāmi taṃ;
content.gathalast: Dukkho vāso araññasmiṃ, raṭṭhaṃ icchāmi gantave.
content.gatha1: Yathā ahaṃ ito gantvā, yasmiṃ janapade vasaṃ;
content.gathalast: Ācāraṃ brahmebrahmaṃ sikkheyyaṃ, taṃ dhammaṃ anusāsa maṃ.
content.gatha1: Sace araññaṃ hitvāna, vanamūlaphalāni ca;
content.gathalast: Raṭṭhe rocayase vāsaṃ, taṃ dhammaṃ nisāmehi me.
content.gatha1: Visaṃ mā paṭisevitthopaṭisevitthapaṭisevittha , papātaṃ parivajjaya;
content.gathalast: Paṅke ca mā visīditthopaṅko ca mā visiyittho , yatto cāsīvise care.
content.gatha1: Kiṃ nu visaṃ papāto vā, paṅko vā brahmacārinaṃ;
content.gathalast: Kaṃ tvaṃ āsīvisaṃ brūsi, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchito;
content.gatha1: Āsavo tāta lokasmiṃ, surā nāma pavuccati;
content.gatha2: Manuññomanuññāmanuññāmanuññā surabhī vaggu, sādu madhu (sī. syā.) khuddarasūpamo rasūpamā (sī. syā. pī.);
content.gathalast: Visaṃ tadāhu ariyā se, brahmacariyassa nārada.
content.gatha1: Itthiyo tāta lokasmiṃ, pamattaṃ pamathenti tā;
content.gatha2: Haranti yuvino cittaṃ, tūlaṃ bhaṭṭhaṃva māluto;
content.gathalast: Papāto eso akkhāto, brahmacariyassa nārada.
content.gatha1: Lābho siloko sakkāro, pūjā parakulesu ca;
content.gathalast: Paṅko eso ca esova (sī. syā. pī.) akkhāto, brahmacariyassa nārada.
content.gatha1: Sasatthā mahantā (syā. ka.) tāta rājāno, āvasanti mahiṃ imaṃ;
content.gathalast: Te tādise manussinde, mahante tāta nārada.
content.gatha1: Issarānaṃ adhipatīnaṃ, na tesaṃ pādato care;
content.gathalast: Āsīvisotiāsīviso soāsīviso so akkhāto, brahmacariyassa nārada.
content.gatha1: Bhattattho bhattakāle ca yaṃ (sī. pī.), yaṃ gehamupasaṅkame;
content.gathalast: Yadettha kusalaṃ jaññā, tattha ghāsesanaṃ care.
content.gatha1: Pavisitvā parakulaṃ, pānatthaṃpānatthopānattho bhojanāya vā;
content.gathalast: Mitaṃ khāde mitaṃ bhuñje, na ca rūpe manaṃ kare.
content.gatha1: Goṭṭhaṃ majjaṃ kirāṭañcakirāsañcakirāsañcakirāsaṃ vā , sabhā nikiraṇāni ca;
content.gathalast: Ārakā parivajjehi, yānīva visamaṃ pathanti.
content.gatha1: Dūte te brahmedūte brāhmaṇa pāhesiṃ, gaṅgātīrasmi jhāyato;
content.gathalast: Tesaṃ puṭṭho na byākāsi, dukkhaṃ guyhamataṃguyhaṃ mataṃtuyhaṃ mataṃtuyhaṃ mataṃ nu te.
content.gatha1: Sace te dukkhamuppajje, kāsīnaṃ raṭṭhavaḍḍhana;
content.gathalast: Mā kho naṃ tassa akkhāhi, yo taṃ dukkhā na mocaye.
content.gatha1: Yo tassayo ca tathā dukkhajātassa, ekaṅgamapi bhāgasoekantamapi bhāsatoekantamapi bhāsato ;
content.gathalast: Vippamoceyya dhammena, kāmaṃ tassa pavedayapavedaye .
content.gatha1: Suvijānaṃ siṅgālānaṃ, sakuṇānañca vassitaṃ;
content.gathalast: Manussavassitaṃ rāja, dubbijānataraṃ tato.
content.gatha1: Api ce maññatī poso, ñāti mitto sakhāti vā;
content.gathalast: Yo pubbe sumano hutvā, pacchā sampajjate diso.
content.gatha1: Yo attano dukkhamanānupuṭṭho, pavedaye jantu akālarūpe;
content.gathalast: Ānandino tassa bhavantimittābhavanta’mittābhavanta’mittā , hitesino tassa dukhī bhavanti.
content.gatha1: Kālañca ñatvāna tathāvidhassa, medhāvīnaṃ ekamanaṃ viditvā;
content.gathalast: Akkheyya tibbānitippānitippānitippāni parassa dhīro, saṇhaṃ giraṃ atthavatiṃ pamuñce.
content.gatha1: Sace ca jaññā avisayhamattano, na te hi mayhaṃnāyaṃ nīti mayhanāyaṃ nīti mayha sukhāgamāya;
content.gathalast: Ekova tibbāni saheyya dhīro, saccaṃ hirottappamapekkhamāno.
content.gatha1: Ahaṃ raṭṭhāni vicaranto, nigame rājadhāniyo;
content.gathalast: Bhikkhamāno mahārāja, ācariyassa dhanatthiko.
content.gatha1: Gahapatī rājapurise, mahāsāle ca brāhmaṇe;
content.gathalast: Te me naṭṭhā mahārāja, tasmā socāmahaṃ bhusaṃ.
content.gatha1: Purisā te mahārāja, manasānuvicintitā;
content.gathalast: Nālaṃ dukkhā pamocetuṃ, tasmā tesaṃ na byāhariṃ.
content.gatha1: Tvañca kho me mahārāja, manasānuvicintito;
content.gathalast: Alaṃ dukkhā pamocetuṃ, tasmā tuyhaṃ pavedayiṃ.
content.gatha1: Tassādāsi pasannatto, kāsīnaṃ raṭṭhavaḍḍhano;
content.gathalast: Jātarūpamaye nikkhe, suvaṇṇassa catuddasāti.
content.gatha1: Rājā kāliṅgo cakkavatti, dhammena pathavimanusāsaṃ manusāsi (syā. ka.);
content.gathalast: Agamāagamāsiagamāsi bodhisamīpaṃ, nāgena mahānubhāvena.
content.gatha1: Kāliṅgo bhāradvājo ca, rājānaṃ kāliṅgaṃ samaṇakolaññaṃ;
content.gathalast: Cakkaṃ vattayato pariggahetvāpariṇetvā , pañjalī idamavoca.
content.gatha1: Paccoroha mahārāja, bhūmibhāgo yathā samaṇuggatosamanugītosamanugītosamanugīto ;
content.gathalast: Idha anadhivarā buddhā, abhisambuddhā virocanti.
content.gatha1: Padakkhiṇato āvaṭṭā, tiṇalatā asmiṃ bhūmibhāgasmiṃ;
content.gathalast: Pathaviyā nābhiyaṃputhuviyā ayaṃpaṭhaviyā ayaṃputhaviyā’yaṃ maṇḍo, iti no sutaṃ mante mahārājasutaṃ mahārājasutaṃ mahārājasutaṃ mahārāja .
content.gatha1: Sāgarapariyantāya, mediniyā sabbabhūtadharaṇiyā;
content.gathalast: Pathaviyā ayaṃ maṇḍo, orohitvā namo karohi.
content.gatha1: Ye te bhavanti nāgā ca, abhijātā ca kuñjarā;
content.gathalast: Ettāvatā padesaṃ te, nāgā neva mupayanti.
content.gatha1: Abhijāto nāgoabhijāto te nāgoabhijāto te nāgoabhijāto te nāgo kāmaṃ, pesehi kuñjaraṃ dantiṃ;
content.gathalast: Ettāvatā padesopadeso capadeso ca , sakkāna sakkā nāgena mupagantuṃ.
content.gatha1: Taṃ sutvā rājā kāliṅgo, veyyañjanikavaco nisāmetvā;
content.gathalast: Sampesesi nāgaṃ ñassāma, mayaṃ yathimassidaṃyathā idaṃyathā idaṃyathā idaṃ vacanaṃ.
content.gatha1: Sampesito ca raññā, nāgo koñcova abhinaditvāna;
content.gathalast: Paṭisakkitvāpaṭiosakkitvā nisīdi, garuṃva bhāraṃ asahamāno.
content.gatha1: Kāliṅgabhāradvājo, nāgaṃ khīṇāyukaṃ viditvāna;
content.gathalast: Aññaṃ saṅkama nāgaṃ, nāgo khīṇāyuko mahārāja.
content.gatha1: Taṃ sutvā kāliṅgo, taramāno saṅkamī nāgaṃ;
content.gatha2: Saṅkanteva raññe, nāgo tattheva patipatito bhumyā;
content.gathalast: Veyyañjanikavaco, yathā tathā ahu nāgo.
content.gatha1: Kāliṅgo rājā kāliṅgaṃ, brāhmaṇaṃ etadavoca;
content.gathalast: Tvameva asi sambuddho, sabbaññū sabbadassāvī.
content.gatha1: Taṃ anadhivāsento kāliṅgaṃkāliṅgokāliṅgokāliṅgo , brāhmaṇo idamavoca;
content.gathalast: Veyyañjanikā hi mayaṃ, buddhā sabbaññuno mahārāja.
content.gatha1: Sabbaññū sabbavidū ca, buddhā na lakkhaṇena jānanti;
content.gathalast: Āgamabalasāāgamapurisā hi mayaṃ, buddhā sabbaṃ pajānanti.
content.gatha1: Mahayitvā sambodhiṃmahāyitvāna sambodhiṃmahāyitvāna sambodhiṃpahaṃsitvāna sambodhiṃmamāyitvāna taṃ bodhiṃ , nānāturiyehi vajjamānehi;
content.gathalast: Mālāvilepanaṃ abhiharitvāmālāgandhavilepanaṃ āharitvāmālāgandhavilepanaṃ āharitvā; pākāraparikkhepaṃ kāresi; atha rājā pāyāsi; pākāraparikkhepaṃ kāresi; atha rājā pāyāsi; pākāraparikkhepaṃ kāresi; atha rājā pāyāsi atha rājā manupāyāsipākāraparikkhepaṃ kāresi; atha rājā pāyāsipākāraparikkhepaṃ kāresi; atha rājā pāyāsipākāraparikkhepaṃ kāresi; atha rājā pāyāsi .
content.gatha1: Saṭṭhi vāhasahassāni, pupphānaṃ sannipātayi;
content.gathalast: Pūjesi rājā kāliṅgo, bodhimaṇḍamanuttaranti varuttameti (sī.).
content.gatha1: Akittiṃakattiṃ disvā sammantaṃ, sakko bhūtapatī bravi;
content.gathalast: Kiṃ patthayaṃ mahābrahme, eko sammasi ghammani.
content.gatha1: Dukkho punabbhavo sakka, sarīrassa ca bhedanaṃ;
content.gathalast: Sammohamaraṇaṃ dukkhaṃ, tasmā sammāmi vāsava.
content.gatha1: Etasmiṃ te sulapite, patirūpe subhāsite;
content.gathalast: Varaṃ kassapa te dammi, yaṃ kiñci manasicchasi.
content.gatha1: Varaṃ ce me ado sakka, sabbabhūtānamissara;
content.gatha2: Yena putte ca dāre ca, dhanadhaññaṃ piyāni ca;
content.gathalast: Laddhā narā naladdhā naññāni tappanti, so lobho na mayī vase.
content.gatha1: Etasmiṃ te sulapite, patirūpe subhāsite;
content.gathalast: Varaṃ kassapa te dammi, yaṃ kiñci manasicchasi.
content.gatha1: Varaṃ ce me ado sakka, sabbabhūtānamissara;
content.gathalast: Yena jātena jīyanti, so doso na mayī vase.
content.gatha1: Etasmiṃ te sulapite, patirūpe subhāsite;
content.gathalast: Varaṃ kassapa te dammi, yaṃ kiñci manasicchasi.
content.gatha1: Varaṃ ce me ado sakka, sabbabhūtānamissara;
content.gatha2: Bālaṃ na passe na suṇe, na ca bālena saṃvase;
content.gathalast: Bālenallāpabālenā’lāpa sallāpaṃ, na kare na ca rocaye.
content.gatha1: Kiṃ nu te akaraṃ bālo, vada kassapa kāraṇaṃ;
content.gathalast: Kena kassapa bālassa, dassanaṃ nābhikaṅkhasi.
content.gatha1: Anayaṃ nayati dummedho, adhurāyaṃ niyuñjati;
content.gatha2: Dunnayo seyyaso hoti, sammā vutto pakuppati;
content.gathalast: Vinayaṃ so na jānāti, sādhu tassa adassanaṃ.
content.gatha1: Etasmiṃ te sulapite, patirūpe subhāsite;
content.gathalast: Varaṃ kassapa te dammi, yaṃ kiñci manasicchasi.
content.gatha1: Varaṃ ce me ado sakka, sabbabhūtānamissara;
content.gatha2: Dhīraṃ passe suṇe dhīraṃ, dhīrena saha saṃvase;
content.gathalast: Dhīrenallāpasallāpaṃ, taṃ kare tañca rocaye.
content.gatha1: Kiṃ nu te akaraṃ dhīro, vada kassapa kāraṇaṃ;
content.gathalast: Kena kassapa dhīrassa, dassanaṃ abhikaṅkhasi.
content.gatha1: Nayaṃ nayati medhāvī, adhurāyaṃ na yuñjati;
content.gatha2: Sunayo seyyaso hoti, sammā vutto na kuppati;
content.gathalast: Vinayaṃ so pajānāti, sādhu tena samāgamo.
content.gatha1: Etasmiṃ te sulapite, patirūpe subhāsite;
content.gathalast: Varaṃ kassapa te dammi, yaṃ kiñci manasicchasi.
content.gatha1: Varaṃ ce me ado sakka, sabbabhūtānamissara;
content.gathalast: Tato ratyā vivasānevivasanevivasanevivasane , sūriyuggamanaṃsuriyassuggamanaṃsuriyassuggamanaṃsuriyassuggamanaṃ pati;
Dibbā bhakkhā pātubhaveyyuṃ, sīlavanto ca yācakā.
content.gatha1: Dadato medadato ca me na khīyetha, datvā nānutapeyyahaṃ;
content.gathalast: Dadaṃ cittaṃ pasādeyyaṃ, etaṃ sakka varaṃ vare.
content.gatha1: Etasmiṃ te sulapite, patirūpe subhāsite;
content.gathalast: Varaṃ kassapa te dammi, yaṃ kiñci manasicchasi.
content.gatha1: Varaṃ ce me ado sakka, sabbabhūtānamissara;
content.gathalast: Na maṃ puna upeyyāsi, etaṃ sakka varaṃ vare.
content.gatha1: Bahūhi vatacariyāhivattacariyāhivattacariyāhivattacariyāhi , narā ca atha nāriyo;
content.gathalast: Dassanaṃ abhikaṅkhanti, kiṃ nu me dassane bhayaṃ.
content.gatha1: Taṃ tādisaṃ devavaṇṇaṃdevavaṇṇiṃ , sabbakāmasamiddhinaṃ;
content.gathalast: Disvā tapo pamajjeyyadisvā tapo pamajjeyyaṃdisvā tapo pamajjeyyaṃdisvā tapo pamajjeyyaṃdisvānahaṃ pamajjeyyaṃ , etaṃ te dassane bhayanti.
content.gatha1: Ahameva dubbhāsitaṃ bhāsi bālo, bhekovaraññe ahimavhāyamāno mavhayāno (sī. pī.);
content.gathalast: Takkāriye sobbhamimaṃsobbhamhi ahaṃ patāmi, na kireva sādhu ativelabhāṇīsādhūtyativelabhāṇī .
content.gatha1: Pappoti macco ativelabhāṇī, bandhaṃ vadhaṃ sokapariddavañca;
content.gathalast: Attānameva garahāsi ettha, ācera yaṃ taṃ nikhaṇanti sobbhe.
content.gatha1: Kimevahaṃ tuṇḍilamanupucchiṃ, kareyya saṃkareyyāsaṃkareyya sabhareyya saṃ bhātaraṃ kāḷikāyaṃkāḷikāyakāḷikāya ;
content.gathalast: Naggovahaṃnaggoca’haṃ vatthayugañca jīno, ayampi attho bahutādisova.
content.gatha1: Yo yujjhamānānamayujjhamānoyujjhamānena ayujjhamāno , meṇḍantaraṃ accupatī kuliṅgo;
content.gathalast: So piṃsito meṇḍasirehi tattha, ayampi attho bahutādisova.
content.gatha1: Caturo janā potthakamaggahesuṃ, ekañca posaṃ anurakkhamānā;
content.gathalast: Sabbeva te bhinnasirā sayiṃsu, ayampi attho bahutādisova.
content.gatha1: Ajā yathā veḷugumbasmiṃ baddhā bandhaṃ (syā. ka.), avakkhipantī asimajjhagacchi;
content.gathalast: Teneva tassā galakāvakantaṃ galayā vikantuṃ (ka.), galakaṃ vikantā (syā.), ayampi attho bahutādisova.
content.gatha1: Ime na devā na gandhabbaputtā, migā ime atthavasaṃ gatā meatthavasābhatā imeatthavasābhatā imeatthavasābhatā ime ;
content.gathalast: Ekañca naṃ sāyamāse pacantu, ekaṃ punappātarāseekañca naṃ pātarāseekañca naṃ pātarāseekañca naṃ pātarāse pacantu.
content.gatha1: Sataṃ sahassāni dubhāsitāni, kalampi nāgghanti subhāsitassa;
content.gathalast: Dubbhāsitaṃ saṅkamāno kileso kilissati (?), tasmā tuṇhī kimpurisākiṃpurisokiṃpuriso na bālyā.
content.gatha1: Yā mesā byāhāsibyākāsibyākāsibyākāsi pamuñcathetaṃ, giriñca naṃgiriṃ varaṃ himavantaṃ nayantu;
content.gathalast: Imañca kho dentu mahānasāya, pātova naṃ pātarāse pacantu.
content.gatha1: Pajjunnanāthā pasavo, pasunāthā ayaṃ pajā;
content.gathalast: Tvaṃ nāthosi tvaṃ-nātho’smi (sī. syā. pī.) mahārāja, nāthohaṃ bhariyāya me amha-nāthā mama bhariyā (ka. sī. syā.);
Dvinnamaññataraṃ ñatvā, mutto gaccheyya pabbataṃ.
content.gatha1: Na ve nindā suparivajjayethasuparivajjayātha , nānā janā sevitabbā janinda;
content.gathalast: Yeneva eko labhate pasaṃsaṃ, teneva añño labhate ninditāraṃ.
content.gatha1: Sabbo loko paricitto aticittoparacittena aticittoparacittena aticittoparacittena acittoparacittena acitto , sabbo loko cittavā samhi citte;
content.gathalast: Paccekacittā puthu sabbasattā, kassīdha cittassa vase na vatte.
content.gatha1: Tuṇhī ahū kimpuriso sabhariyo abhāṇī (ka.), yo dāni byāhāsi bhayassa bhīto;
content.gathalast: So dāni mutto sukhito arogo, vācākirevattavatī narānanti.
content.gatha1: Tassakassakassa gāmavaraṃ dammi, nāriyo ca alaṅkatā;
content.gathalast: Yo ko (sī. syā. pī.) metaṃ migamakkhāti makkhāsi (syā. ka.), migānaṃ migamuttamaṃ.
content.gatha1: Mayhaṃ gāmavaraṃ dehi, nāriyo ca alaṅkatā;
content.gathalast: Ahaṃ te migamakkhissaṃ, migānaṃ migamuttamaṃ.
content.gatha1: Etasmiṃ vanasaṇḍasmiṃ, ambā sālā ca pupphitā;
content.gathalast: Indagopakasañchannā , ettheso tiṭṭhate migo.
content.gatha1: Dhanuṃ advejjhaṃadejjhaṃadejjhaṃsarajjaṃ katvāna, usuṃ sannayhupāgamisandhāyupāgamisandhāyupāgami ;
content.gathalast: Migo ca disvā rājānaṃ, dūrato ajjhabhāsatha.
content.gatha1: Āgamehi mahārāja, mā maṃ vijjhi rathesabha;
content.gathalast: Ko nu te idamakkhāsi, ettheso tiṭṭhate migo.
content.gatha1: Esa pāpacaro poso, samma tiṭṭhati ārakā;
content.gathalast: Soyaṃ so hi (sī. syā. pī.) me idamakkhāsi, ettheso tiṭṭhate migo.
content.gatha1: Saccaṃ kireva māhaṃsu, narā ekacciyā idha;
content.gathalast: Kaṭṭhaṃ niplavitaṃ seyyo, na tvevekacci yo naro.
content.gatha1: Kiṃ nu ruru garahasi migānaṃ, kiṃ pakkhīnaṃ kiṃ pana mānusānaṃ;
content.gathalast: Bhayañhi maṃ vindatinapparūpaṃ, sutvāna taṃ mānusiṃ bhāsamānaṃ.
content.gatha1: Yamuddhariṃ vāhane vuyhamānaṃ, mahodake salile sīghasote;
content.gathalast: Tatonidānaṃ bhayamāgataṃ mama, dukkho have rāja asabbhi saṅgamo.
content.gatha1: Sohaṃ catuppattamimaṃ vihaṅgamaṃ, tanucchidaṃ hadaye ossajāmi;
content.gathalast: Hanāmi taṃ mittadubbhiṃ akiccakāriṃhanāmi mittaddu’makiccakāriṃhanāmi mittaddu’makiccakāriṃ , yo tādisaṃ kammakataṃ na jāne.
content.gatha1: Dhīrassa bālassa have janinda, santo vadhaṃ nappasaṃsanti jātu;
content.gatha2: Kāmaṃ gharaṃ gacchatu pāpadhammo, yañcassa bhaṭṭhaṃ tadetassa dehi;
content.gathalast: Ahañca te kāmakaro bhavāmi.
content.gatha1: Addhā ruru aññataro sataṃ so sataṃ’se (sī.), yo dubbhatodubbhinodūbhato mānusassa na dubbhi;
content.gatha2: Kāmaṃ gharaṃ gacchatu pāpadhammo, yañcassa bhaṭṭhaṃ tadetassa dammi;
content.gathalast: Ahañca te kāmacāraṃ dadāmi.
content.gatha1: Suvijānaṃ siṅgālānaṃ, sakuṇānañcavassitaṃ;
content.gathalast: Manussavassitaṃ rāja, dubbijānataraṃ tato.
content.gatha1: Api ce maññatī poso, ñāti mitto sakhāti vā;
content.gathalast: Yo pubbe sumano hutvā, pacchā sampajjate diso.
content.gatha1: Samāgatā jānapadā, negamā ca samāgatā;
content.gathalast: Migā sassāni khādanti, taṃ devo paṭisedhatu.
content.gatha1: Kāmaṃ janapado māsi, raṭṭhañcāpi vinassatu;
content.gathalast: Na tvevāhaṃ ruruṃ dubbhe, datvā abhayadakkhiṇaṃ.
content.gatha1: Mā me janapado āsimā maṃ janapado ahu , raṭṭhañcāpi vinassatu;
content.gathalast: Na tvevāhaṃna tvevana tvevana tveva migarājassa, varaṃ datvā musā bhaṇeti.
content.gatha1: Āsīsethevaāsiṃsethevaāsiṃsethevaāsiṃsetheva puriso, na nibbindeyya paṇḍito;
content.gathalast: Passāmi vohaṃ attānaṃ, yathā icchiṃ tathā ahu.
content.gatha1: Āsīsetheva puriso, na nibbindeyya paṇḍito;
content.gathalast: Passāmi vohaṃ attānaṃ, udakā thalamubbhataṃ.
content.gatha1: Vāyametheva puriso, na nibbindeyya paṇḍito;
content.gathalast: Passāmi vohaṃ attānaṃ, yathā icchiṃ tathā ahu.
content.gatha1: Vāyametheva puriso, na nibbindeyya paṇḍito;
content.gathalast: Passāmi vohaṃ attānaṃ, udakā thalamubbhataṃ.
content.gatha1: Dukkhūpanītopi naro sapañño, āsaṃ na chindeyya sukhāgamāya;
content.gathalast: Bahū hi phassā ahitā hitā ca, avitakkitā maccamupabbajantimaccumupabbajantimaccumupabbajantimaccumupabbajantimaccumupapajjantimaccumupapajjanti .
content.gatha1: Acintitampi bhavati, cintitampi vinassati;
content.gathalast: Na hi cintāmayā bhogā, itthiyā purisassa vā.
content.gatha1: Sarabhaṃ giriduggasmiṃ, yaṃ tvaṃ anusarī pure;
content.gathalast: Alīnacittassa tuvaṃ, vikkantamanujīvasi tava, vikkantaṃ jīvitaṃ labhi (ka.).
content.gatha1: Yo taṃ viduggā narakā samuddhari, silāya yoggaṃ sarabho karitvā;
content.gathalast: Dukkhūpanītaṃ maccumukhā pamocayi, alīnacittaṃ taṃ migaṃ tameva (syā. ka.) vadesi.
content.gatha1: Kiṃ tvaṃ nutuvannutuvannu tattheva tadā ahosi, udāhu te koci naṃtaṃ etadakkhā;
content.gathalast: Vivaṭṭacchaddo nusi sabbadassī, ñāṇaṃ nu te brāhmaṇa bhiṃsarūpaṃ.
content.gatha1: Na cevahaṃ tattha tadā ahosiṃ, na cāpi me koci naṃtaṃ etadakkhā;
content.gathalast: Gāthāpadānañca subhāsitānaṃ, atthaṃ tadānenti janinda dhīrā.
content.gatha1: Ādāya pattiṃpattaṃpaṭṭiṃ paraviriyaghātiṃ, cāpe saraṃ kiṃ vicikicchase tuvaṃ;
content.gathalast: Nunnonuṇṇonuṇṇonuṇṇotuṇṇo saro sarabhaṃ hantu khippaṃ, annañhi etaṃ varapañña rañño.
content.gatha1: Addhā pajānāmi ahampi etaṃ, annaṃ migo brāhmaṇa khattiyassa;
content.gathalast: Pubbe katañcapubbe ca kataṃ apacāyamāno, tasmā migaṃ sarabhaṃ no hanāmi.
content.gatha1: Neso migo mahārāja, asureso disampati;
content.gathalast: Etaṃ hantvā manussinda, bhavassu amarādhipo.
content.gatha1: Sace ca rājārājarājarāja vicikicchase tuvaṃ, hantuṃ migaṃ sarabhaṃ sahāyakaṃsahāyakaṃ mesahāyakaṃ me ;
content.gathalast: Saputtadāro naravīraseṭṭhanaraviriyaseṭṭhanaraviriyaseṭṭha , gantvāgantāgantāgantā tuvaṃ vetaraṇiṃ yamassa.
content.gatha1: Kāmaṃ ahaṃ jānapadā ca sabbe, puttā ca dārā ca sahāyasaṅghā;
content.gathalast: Gacchemu taṃ vetaraṇiṃ yamassa, na tveva hañño mama pāṇado yo pāṇada’ssa (sī. syā. pī.).
content.gatha1: Ayaṃ migo kicchagatassa mayhaṃ, ekassa kattā vivanasmi ghore;
content.gathalast: Taṃ tādisaṃ pubbakiccaṃ saranto, jānaṃ mahābrahme kathaṃ haneyyaṃ.
content.gatha1: Mittābhirādhī cirameva jīva, rajjaṃ imaṃ dhammaguṇerajjampimaṃ cassa gaṇe pasāsa;
content.gathalast: Nārīgaṇehi paricāriyanto, modassu raṭṭhe tidiveva vāsavo.
content.gatha1: Akkodhano niccapasannacitto, sabbātithī yācayogo bhavitvāpāhunake karitvāyācayogo viditvā ;
content.gathalast: Datvā ca bhutvā ca yathānubhāvaṃ, anindito saggamupehi ṭhānanti.
content.gatha1: Varaamba kuṭhāri sahaṃsavaro, atharaññasmiṃ dūtakapañcamako;
content.gathalast: Atha bodhi akitti sutakkarinā, atha rurumigenaparo sarabhoti.
